properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 14 at 1:42PM PST until January 16 at 3:00AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 45 kt and seas 11 to 13 feet at 13 seconds
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, south winds 20 to 30
kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 9 to 11 feet at 13 seconds
expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 9 PM Wednesday to 3 AM PST
Thursday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 9 AM to 9 PM PST
Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 9 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM WEDNESDAY TO 3 AM PST THURSDAY
